full_threads.body: Logged 30mins to Harvest

@rica all good on this one, I met with Chrystal to discuss the page and updates. 

(Time: 30mins) meeting over Zoom.

Hi Chrystal, 

Chris here jumping to help get this page up to scratch as efficiently as possible. 

I think it would be good to meet over a Zoom call to ensure we understand the instructions. Does tomorrow work for you? You are welcome to choose your preferred time here: https://wolfiq.com.au/chris
@chris need your assistance here

Thank you Rica, there is a few things on my email below not addressed and required further discussion. Please refer to Paragraph 4 and 5. Can I please see the sand background as Chris had done on one of the first versions, just to see if it would be a good addition? I welcome input so please make suggestions if you have any. Is there a solution to a pop up window for each toggle - refer to previous email further below for further clarification.

I checked the mobile site for this draft page, and it only scrolls to a certain point and cuts off some of the page. Can you see this when viewing on mobile?

On Toggle 5 'Who Owns Murray Zircon', there is an image, can this be clicked on by the user to make it larger if necessary?

The text from the original About Us Page is missing on the draft page. See screenshot.

Many thanks

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/


We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

(Time:10mins)

Logged 15mins to Harvest

Hi Chrystal, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://murrayzircon.com.au/about-us-draft/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

A new header image attached Chris.


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/


We wish to acknowledge the traditional custodians of this land and their Elders past, present and emerging. In particular those of the River Murray Mallee Aboriginal People and Kaurna, on whose land we share and operate.
We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

IMPORTANT: The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential. They are intended for the named recipient(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof.

Great feedback Chris, thank you. I will remember that re: keeping clicks to a minimum.

When I mentioned adding a heading FAQs, I was thinking to place it directly above the toggles, not on the header image. Do you think that would be better to highlight what that section of the page is?

The header image does need to be changed, so thank you I will get you a new image for this as I am told this is currently of a photo from Canada.

The sand background I referred to was from the first draft that you did and not related to the header image. Screen shot attached. If it would look out of place or you think we shouldn't add another element like this, happy to hear that from you of course 😊

Another thought, due to some of the answers to the FAQs being long, when a toggle is clicked could it open up a pop-up window (or similar) so the user doesn't have to scroll down so far to read it. This may not fit in with the aim to reduce the amount of clicks?

How does it look on the mobile site too please?

Many thanks

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au

Logged 30mins to Harvest
Hi @rica (Time: 30mins) update already sent to Chrystal.

Hi Chrystal,

Thanks for the update.

1. The heading of the page has been changed to FAQs.
2. We don't recommend placing text over images as it makes it hard to read (It's also considered against best practice). More than happy to change the Hero Image, please just let me know your preferred image. 
3. We also don't recommend adding a button to take the user to another page with the FAQs. This adds an unnecessary click for a user to get the information they are looking for. A rule of thumb is to minimise the "clicks".
4. I have added adjusted the layout to add the FAQs to the empty area on the left-hand side shown in the screenshot. 

Please review and let me know if this works: https://murrayzircon.com.au/about-us-draft/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris

Hope you are well.

I have consolidated the FAQs best I can. There are 7 questions from an original 12 uploaded. There are other topics I must cover later down the track and then add. However, for now I need to get the layout sorted with you and get them published as soon as possible.

Back to the layout: Happy to have the questions altogether as you suggested but we don't like the way it is placed currently on the draft page.

It needs a heading 'FAQs'. We are still open to the idea of the sand background or something that gives some character or highlights it.

Maybe the FAQs should be positioned on the left in the blank white area (see screenshot for reference) OR would a green button at the top of the page that links to the FAQs on a separate page - there is something similar on the home page that links to the About Us page.

These are only suggestions of course. Thinking out loud.

Appreciate your persistence to get this right for us.

Kind Regards

Chrystal


Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

M 0419861712E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
W http://www.murrayzircon.com.au/

We acknowledge and respect their continuing culture and the contribution they make to the life of this city and this region

Logged 15mins to Harvest
@rica (Time:15min)

Hi Chrystal, 

Glad to read you are feeling better. 

I have revised the layout of the page to allow a visitor an easier flow into the FAQs. 

My recommendation would be to place all the questions into one section, consolidating similar questions where possible. E.g. the following questions can be answered in one FAQ "Who is Murray Zircon?"
  • Are you an Australian company?
  • How long has the company been in existence?
  • Who owns Murray Zircon?
The next step would be load all content and review the page once complete.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
If you are looking at the page Chris, I merged the questions from the second section into the first section. Is this better. I haven't deleted the second section as I wanted your input first in terms of how this will go for the user and if this is what you meant in your video 😊


Chrystal Goodhand

IMPORTANT: The contents of this email and any attachments are confidential. They are intended for the named recipient(s) only. If you have received this email by mistake, please notify the sender immediately and do not disclose the contents to anyone or make copies thereof.

Sorry Chris, Winter sickness got me. Thanks for putting this together so quickly - great work.

This looks good. My only concern is how can we make it easy for viewers to find the FAQs. You can't really see them when you first click on the About Us page. You only notice that they are there when you scroll down and users may not do this. Leave that with you to have a think about. Ill attach what I have ready to go already. It's a slow process to get each section approved. I am happy to group them (I haven't done this yet), I am not sure if you mean not to have the three distinct sections (I actually have four) and just have each question as a toggle underneath a heading 'FAQs? Or do you mean keep the headings About Murray Zircon, About the Mine etc but reduce the number of toggles under each section.

Kind Regards

Chrystal

Logged 30mins to Harvest
@rica (Time: 30mins)

Hi Chrystal, 

Great to see your email come through. 

Here is a quick video update: https://www.loom.com/share/84f63e8af45d4789baf9ebf3459fe0ec?sid=5510ee87-53c1-4dfb-af4e-8524e164a483

Following the above updates, there is a total of 1 hour of support remaining in June. As an estimate, we should be able to upload the answers to your questions and optimise the layouts inside the available time providing there aren't numerous revisions and tweaks.  

With your permission, we'd like to tackle the pop once the page layouts/refinements are complete.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hello Chris and team

The other week we discussed adding a FAQs feature to the Murray Zircon website. As I work on collating the content for the FAQs, are you able to create the space? I think your idea of incorporating it on the About Us page is worth progressing. Is there enough support time remaining for June to get this done? I can add the content, it will be mostly text and maybe an image here and there. I envisage that we will start with headings like this below and then questions under each heading. Then we will build on it over time or make changes as necessary.

About Murray Zircon (MZ)
  • Who is Murray Zircon?
  • Are you an Australian Company?
  • How long has the company been in existence?
  • Who owns Murray Zircon?


About the Mine
  • What's the history of the Mine?
  • How big is the area that that the mine covers?
  • What is mined there?
  • How are the minerals used?
  • Who buys the minerals?
  • How long will mining occur in the area?


About Community Engagement
  • Can anyone in the community arrange a tour of the mine?
  • What investment has Murray Zircon made into the local community?
  • Does Murray Zircon have a community sponsorship program?


Alternatively, the FAQs page could also be a page as a drop-down menu under About Us in the Main Menu. Very happy to be guided by the expertise of the developers. Either way the site must remain easy to use, fresh and clean.

Thought it would be good to have one of those 'call to action' pop ups too (see screen shot attached):

Got a great question to add to our FAQs? ~~~~~ Ask here

Kind Regards
Chrystal



Chrystal Goodhand
Community Liasion Officer

E cgoodhand@murrayzircon.com.au
